short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play online movies in the highest or lowest available quality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pikashow Apk helps to watch all videos and movies automatically in HD quality! Supported up to 8K/4K.

Online videos have auto, HD, and LQ resolutions. The online movie player is pushed by this extension to play videos at their highest (HD) or lowest (LQ) quality.
	
*How to Use?

Select any choice to achieve HD resolution by clicking the Pikashow Apk - HD Video icon, and you're done!


*Main Feature:
Play movies in HD, 4K, or 8K resolution automatically. Users may choose from a variety of resolutions, including 1080p, 720p, and others, depending on what's offered for any single movie.
